title: FONT BOUTIQUE
content:
FONT BOUTIQUE is an independent label founded   
by Heinrich Lischka (Typografski) in 2002.   
   
We start off with the type NOGA - an elegant,   
slender Grotesk with a human character.   
   
The second FONT BOUTIQUE type called NASTEPNA   
is going to be released in August 2002.   
   
At irregular intervals more Types are going to follow.   
   
To develop useful types is our philosophy.   
   
 [http://www.fontboutique.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225547/http:/www.fontboutique.de/)
author: typografski
